programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Bees - Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like Piper can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep19
programme.desc: An Uphill Battle - The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep19
programme.desc: That's Sooo Rob - Julien's former BFF, Rob, returns to lure the king away from his royal responsibilities and back to his crazy partying days.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel - When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it's time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat's Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - There's a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away,and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile,Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby's help.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat,he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread,the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Big Shine - When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Thunder Misters - Jealous of the Thunder Sisters, the men on the farm undergo a series of difficult initiation rituals to try and join the exclusive tribe of women.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Eep loves action and adventure - it's in her blood. But when Eep starts adventuring in her sleep, she has to try to find the cause of her new sleep walking to avoid ending up in dangerous situations.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Fire Escape - Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alex's new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Ride or Die - After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Empty Fireworm Nest - When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms' excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp,he's forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However,Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee's Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Big Shine - When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Water - The Dinotrux crew builds an aqueduct to bring water back to the Flatirons during a drought, but D-Structs tries to sabotage their plan.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket , Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Smoovin On Up , The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flamb?. Odlulu is already there, using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep10
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Banner - The banner for Revs' Air show has disappeared. Where can it be ? Could someone be trying to spoil Revs' show? Noddy investigates.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep11
programme.desc: The Case Of The Fallen Star - When the brightest star in the sky falls, Noddy has to find it and work out how to get it back into its place in the sky before its light goes out forever. Will he manage in time for the fairies Sparkle party ?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Gadget James And Maxi - Maxi is jealous of all of James' gadgets, or more precisely, the attention the other cars give him. He persuades Molecom to devise some gadgets for him with hilarious results

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor Or Bust - Mr Carburettor has commissioned a bust of himself for Silver Hatch. Disaster strikes when it is dropped, Big Chris tries to make amends, while Marsha distracts Mr Carburettor and the reporter

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa And Poorly Pia - Pia has hurt her wing and cant fly around or play so Raa Raa tries to find a way to cheer her up.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Raa Raa Goes Clickety Clack - Raa Raa helps Ooo Ooo build a dominostyle chain of clickety clack logs that stretches all across the Jungle

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick - When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spaceship - The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor's coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty's five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty's babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it's too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. She's going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs , Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver , Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep10
programme.desc: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back - When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Itty Bitty Blossom - The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Dollhouse Store Day - When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip's Music Store!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Phil's Fun Farm - When Phil learns no one on the farm thinks he's fun, he sets out to prove them all wrong... by building a crazy amusement park.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Joy Story - When Eep and Dawn find a stranded egg, they eagerly take it in as their new pet, but when they learn the egg is not what it seems, they have to return it before it becomes dangerous.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Staci's plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep18
programme.desc: It Flies in the Family - Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Magma Comes to the Surface - The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Poison in the Pit of the Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor's coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty's five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty's babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it's too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. She's going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Dollhouse - When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gorgwatch Project - After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Skate or Dawn - When Guy invents a primitive skateboard, Eep and Dawn have a blast trying new tricks. But when the punch monkeys want to take over the girl's awesome new skate spot, Dawn and the punch monkeys enter a skate-off to win back the skate canyon once and for all.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Phil's Fun Farm - When Phil learns no one on the farm thinks he's fun, he sets out to prove them all wrong... by building a crazy amusement park.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Catastrophe - During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D'Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Slide - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Chet Vs Dr. Disorder , Damselfly In Distress - Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome , My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep26
programme.desc: Shadows of Bali - Odlulu uses the Shadow Puppet Key to create her own living shadows. When her mischievous shadows run off with the key, the Wanderers learn the only way to reattach the shadows is to touch them with the key. So, with the promise of a puppet show, they lure the shadows to the puppet theater, where they launch an epic game of tag to recapture the shadows before sunset

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Humpback Whale - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Pacific ocean, off the tropical islands of Hawaii, on a baby animal mission to see how a baby humpback whale prepares for its 5000 km migration North to the rich feeding grounds of Alaska.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mission: Transport Museum - Kika and her family are on a day out to the Woofton Transport Museum. But when their new audio guide starts malfunctioning, Kika needs her super-sight to find the curator.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Cheetah and Warthog - This episode features the cheetah and warthog, and their wild connection - they both communicate using smell.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep13
programme.desc: Ye Old Piratey Butlaarrrs - Captain Captain has been reading about how captains of yonder years had 'butlaarrrs' in the Olde Book of Piratey Historrry. Captain Captain wonders if Sandy and Seaweed could try being her butlers!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep29
programme.desc: The Harvest Badge - Duggee is getting ready to harvest the ripe crops that grown. The squirrels remember when they planted their seeds, watered them, and left them to grow, and now it's time to help Duggee pick them all.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep28
programme.desc: The Space Badge - Duggee teaches the squirrels all about the stars, the planets and the Milky Way!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep27
programme.desc: The Spooky Badge - The Squirrels are playing dress up when they hear a ghostly sound. What is going on?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Chocolate Hills, Philippines - Greedy Grandmaster Glitch has been gorging on chocolate and wants more! The Grimbots discover a place called the Chocolate Hills on Bohol Island in the Philippines and take him there.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Volcanic Island - There's trouble erupting for the Go Jetters as Glitch disturbs an underwater volcano...

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep21
programme.desc: All Tracks Lead to Rome - Thomas is working on the Italian Railway, keen to prove to his new friend Gina that he is an expert in all things Italian.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Mermaid - Fifi asks Stanley to help them find a Mermaid so they can take its picture for school. They explore the ocean floor in their search where they encounter lots of ocean creatures.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Sophie Can Do - Stanley asks Sophie to help out with a few of his jobs whilst she waits for her dino costume to dry. The pair go about town fixing everyone's problems in fun and imaginative ways.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Beautiful Game - Monty, Jimmy Jones and Stan are preparing to play a game of soccer, but when they realise they don't have the proper gear to play, Stan abandons the match, leaving Monty questioning whether you can only play a game if you have all the correct equipment.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep34
programme.desc: It's Time to Make a New Game - JoJo and Raya play snakes and ladders, but think it would be fun to make a new game.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Obstacle Course - Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Promises - Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Voice Badge - When the Squirrels start talking to each other in the wrong voices it's clear something has gone awry. But Duggee has his voice badge. He knows what to do!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Stick Badge - Duggee and the squirrels prepare for a campfire by collecting sticks of all sizes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Ladybird's Gameshow - Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Climate Change, The Arctic Ocean - The Go Jetters are watching for polar bears, but an iceberg is heading for their ship!

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Apple - Apple sings in celebration of her great-great-grandad, Apple Tree's, 100th birthday.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Broccoli - It's Broccoli and his floret, Broc, performing their phenomenal ventriloquist act.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Operation Kiwi - Supertato, Carrot and Tomato are exploring in the plant aisle when they hear a strange noise. They follow the noise and meet the famous Kiwi the Explorer, who needs their help.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Museum Mischief - Evil Pea pretends to help Supertato and Carrot train for crime prevention, but she tricks them and steals a mobile phone. Supertato and Carrot have a clever plan to get it back.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep75
programme.desc: Greens - Tinky Winky, Laa-Laa and Po pick delicious green beans. The Noo-noo puts the beans into the Tubby Custard Machine and out comes tasty, green Tubby Custard!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep15
programme.desc: Ship - Dee encourages a friend to say `ship', and goes on a whirlwind word adventure. They see lots of different types of ships: a big ship, a sailing ship, a pirate ship, and a shaky, shaky ship.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Pop Goes Circus - The friends are joining Hooper's circus school. But when Plom struggles to find a skill he's good at, will he be able to earn his circus school certificate?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Sun in a Bucket - When the sun mysteriously disappears, Messy and his friends zoom up to space to find out what's going on and bump into some old friends.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep47
programme.desc: Cricket - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep46
programme.desc: Slide - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what's happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: Travelogue

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group's new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today's world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.desc: Why are used cars in Venezuela a thriving industry? - In Venezuela demand for second-hand vehicles is huge, and they are even used as investments -- a hedge against inflation so voracious it makes no sense to park money in a bank account. "Only in Venezuela can the price of used cars go up," said a man as he leaned against a 1995 Ford Lariat he wants to sell at a tidy profit of 8,000 bolivars, or 1,860 dollars, after owning it for three months.

programme.title: Hikikomori Pilgrimage
programme.desc: Five young men from around Japan, once withdrawn from society - a phenomenon known as hikikomori - embark on a 1,200-kilometer pilgrimage around the island of Shikoku, on a journey of self-discovery.
